titleStmt.title: The miscellanie, or, A registrie, and methodicall directorie of orizons Exhibiting a presentment of the soules requestes in the high court of the heauenly parliament: prefaced with meditations of a three-fold distinct nature, preparatiuely instructing the Christian soule ...
titleStmt.author: Wentworth, Paul.

titleStmt.title: The miscellanie, or, A registrie, and methodicall directorie of orizons Exhibiting a presentment of the soules requestes in the high court of the heauenly parliament: prefaced with meditations of a three-fold distinct nature, preparatiuely instructing the Christian soule ...
titleStmt.author: Wentworth, Paul.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By William White and Thomas Creede] for I. Harison [2], dwelling at the signe of the golden Anchor in Paternoster row,

notesStmt.note: Creede printed quire Y to end; White printed the rest (STC).
"A premonition for the addressing our soules vnto a deuotion" (caption title) begins new pagination on 2A1.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
